channel.title: Need help with a few things
channel.description:
Have a few problems with my server.
Two of the easier problems are this server didn't come with a working noclip command or a empty command.I tried looking on the internet and even in other servers but couldn't find either. If anybody has working commands for those they could post I would appreciate it.
Also, when I drop an item on my server, it doesn't appear on the ground. I would like to make it where dropped items show up on the ground, and if anybody knows how to, make it so after a certain price of an item it disappears after being dropped or the server does not let you drop it.
Hope everything I typed made sense and thanks in advanced.
EDIT: How would I remove the random event thing that pops up and tells you to choose a certain skill? It is very annoying.

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

noclip is a client command.
also just search for drop and see what you’ll get.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few things

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Silent_Assassin Silent Assassin
item.description:
@Silent_Assassin wrote:

If anybody can tell me exactly how I would enable items to be dropped that would be good. I searched client.java for dropitem and droppeditems but no luck.

I tried posting my client.java but it wouldn’t let me.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few things
